verses.verse: "Call<WH7121> now,<WH4994> is there<WH3426> anyone who will answer<WH6030> you? And to which<WH4310> of the holy<WH6918> ones<WH6918> will you turn<WH6437>?
"For vexation<WH9213> slays<WH2026> the foolish<WH191> man,<WH191> And anger<WH7068> kills<WH4191> the simple.<WH6601>
"I have seen<WH7200> the foolish<WH191> taking<WH8327> root,<WH8327> And I cursed<WH6895> his abode<WH5116> immediately.<WH6597>
"His sons<WH1121> are far<WH7368> from safety,<WH3468> They are even oppressed<WH1792> in the gate,<WH8179> Neither<WH369> is there<WH369> a deliverer.<WH5337>
"His harvest<WH7105> the hungry<WH7457> devour,<WH398> And take<WH3947> it to a [place of] thorns;<WH6791> And the schemer<WH6782> is eager<WH7602> for their wealth.<WH2428>
"For affliction<WH205> does not come<WH3318> from the dust,<WH6083> Neither<WH3808> does trouble<WH5999> sprout<WH6779> from the ground,<WH127>
For man<WH120> is born<WH3205> for trouble,<WH5999> As sparks<WH1121> <WH7565> fly<WH5774> upward.<WH1361>
"But as for me, I would seek<WH1875> God,<WH410> And I would place<WH7760> my cause<WH1700> before<WH413> God;<WH430>
Who does<WH6213> great<WH1419> and unsearchable<WH369> <WH2714> things,<WH2714> Wonders<WH6381> without<WH5704> <WH369> number.<WH4557>
"He gives<WH5414> rain<WH4306> on the earth,<WH776> And sends<WH7971> water<WH4325> on the fields,<WH2351>
So that He sets<WH7760> on high<WH4791> those who are lowly,<WH8217> And those who mourn<WH6937> are lifted<WH7682> to safety.<WH3468>
"He frustrates<WH6565> the plotting<WH4284> of the shrewd,<WH6175> So that their hands<WH3027> cannot<WH3808> attain<WH6213> success.<WH8454>
"He captures<WH3920> the wise<WH2450> by their own shrewdness<WH6193> And the advice<WH6098> of the cunning<WH6617> is quickly<WH4116> thwarted.<WH4116>
"By day<WH3119> they meet<WH6298> with darkness,<WH2822> And grope<WH4959> at noon<WH6672> as in the night.<WH3915>
"But He saves<WH3467> from the sword<WH2719> of their mouth,<WH6310> And the poor<WH34> from the hand<WH3027> of the mighty.<WH2389>
"So the helpless<WH1800> has<WH1961> hope,<WH8615> And unrighteousness<WH9390> must shut<WH7092> its mouth.<WH6310>
"Behold,<WH2009> how happy<WH835> is the man<WH582> whom God<WH433> reproves,<WH3198> So do not despise<WH3988> the discipline<WH4148> of the Almighty.<WH7706>
"For He inflicts<WH3510> pain,<WH3510> and gives<WH2280> relief;<WH2280> He wounds,<WH4272> and His hands<WH3027> [also] heal.<WH7495>
"From six<WH8337> troubles<WH6869> He will deliver<WH5337> you, Even in seven<WH7651> evil<WH9563> will not touch<WH5060> you.
"In famine<WH7458> He will redeem<WH6299> you from death,<WH4194> And in war<WH4421> from the power<WH3027> of the sword.<WH2719>
"You will be hidden<WH2244> from the scourge<WH7752> of the tongue,<WH3956> Neither<WH3808> will you be afraid<WH3372> of violence<WH7701> when<WH3588> it comes.<WH935>
"You will laugh<WH7832> at violence<WH7701> and famine,<WH3720> Neither<WH408> will you be afraid<WH3372> of wild<WH776> beasts.<WH9130>
"For you will be in league<WH1285> with the stones<WH68> of the field;<WH7704> And the beasts<WH9130> of the field<WH7704> will be at peace<WH7999> with you.
"And you will know<WH3045> that your tent<WH168> is secure,<WH7965> For you will visit<WH6485> your abode<WH5116> and fear<WH2398> no<WH3808> loss.<WH2398>
"You will know<WH3045> also that your descendants<WH2233> will be many,<WH7227> And your offspring<WH6631> as the grass<WH6212> of the earth.<WH776>
"You will come<WH935> to the grave<WH6913> in full<WH3624> vigor,<WH3624> Like the stacking<WH5927> of grain<WH1430> in its season.<WH6256>
"Behold<WH2009> this,<WH384> we have investigated<WH2713> it, thus<WH3651> it is; Hear<WH8085> it, and know<WH3045> for yourself."
